Dynamic Objects¶

What are they?¶

Added in version 0.4, dynamic objects are similar to normal objects, but they allow shapes with custom parameter layouts.

Usage¶

To create a dynamic object, use the createDynamicObject(function) function. The function parameter should be the code to execute a shape function, e.g createDynamicObject("cuboid, 0, 0, 0, 100, 50, 50"). The function parameter must be in speech marks.
